install.name: EasyBlog Image wall module
install.author: StackIdeas
install.description: Displays a list of blog posts represented as an image stream in a module.

param.name: routingtype
param.label: Routing Type
param.description: Choose the routing type when generate blog post link

param.name: menuitemid
param.label: Use Menu Item
param.description: Select menu item if you have choose to use 'menu item' as routing type

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (set it to 0 if post limiting if not required).

param.name: catid
param.label: Category ID
param.description: Only select blog posts from specific categories. To enter multiple categories, separate them with a comma E.g:(1,2,3) . Leave empty to select from all categories

param.name: columns
param.label: Columns
param.description: Enter the number of columns that you want to display for each row.

param.name: imagewidth
param.label: Maximum width of image
param.description: Enter the maximum width of the image item in pixels

param.name: imageheight
param.label: Maximum height of image
param.description: Enter the maximum height of the image item in pixels

param.name: ordering
param.label: Order by
param.description: Specify the ordering behavior for the sorting criteria

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
